altLabel._value: Maritime Division, Defence Science and Technology Organisation (DSTO)

primaryTopic.creator: http://editor.vocabs.ands.org.au/user/Natalia-Atkins
primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: Defence Science and Technology Organisation's (DSTO) Maritime Division provides technologies and scientific and technical expertise to deliver the capability edge to the war fighter and enhance the operational performance and survivability of defence platforms in the maritime domain. In 2015, the DSTO changed its name to the Defence Science and Technology Group (DST Group).
primaryTopic.isReplacedBy: Maritime Division, Defence Science and Technology Group (DST Group), Department of Defence (DoD), Australian Government

prefLabel._value: Maritime Division, Defence Science and Technology Organisation (DSTO), Department of Defence (DoD), Australian Government

primaryTopic.scopeNote: Organisation no longer exists. Replaced by http://vocab.aodn.org.au/def/organisation/entity/407
